item.title: AEW UK REIT PLC
item.description: AEW UK REIT plc invests in and manages a diversified portfolio of small, high yielding commercial properties across the UK.

item.title: BMO Real Estate Investments Limited
item.description: BMO Real Estate is a REIT with a diversified office, retail and industrial portfolio of freehold and predominantly long leasehold UK commercial properties.

item.title: The British Land Company PLC
item.description: The British Land Company is a UK REIT manages a portfolio of commercial properties focused on retail locations around the UK and London offices.

item.title: Capital & Regional PLC
item.description: Capital & Regional is a UK focused retail property REIT specialising in community shopping centres that provide value-orientated retail goods and services.

item.title: CEIBA Investments Limited
item.description: CEIBA Investments is a UK REIT investing in Cuba, with a focus on investment in Cuba’s commercial real estate, tourism, and other sectors of the Cuban economy.

item.title: Custodian REIT PLC
item.description: Custodian is a UK REIT with a portfolio comprising properties predominantly let to institutional grade tenants throughout the UK.

item.title: Derwent London PLC
item.description: Derwent London is a UK REIT with a portfolio of 5.6 million sq ft (523,600 sq m) of commercial real estate, predominantly in central London.

item.title: Drum Income Plus REIT PLC
item.description: Drum Income Plus is a REIT with a portfolio properties let to institutional grade tenants on long leases throughout the UK.

item.title: Tritax Big Box REIT PLC
item.description: Tritax Big Box is the only REIT dedicated to investing in very large logistics facilities in the UK. They manage some of the UK’s most sought-after Big Boxes.
